attributes.action: Modify legislation to allow scooters and motorcycles to use bus lanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is the Government's stated objective to reduce pollution and congestion so to encourage more use of scooters and motorcyles the law prohibiting their use in bus lanes should be amended.
Currently only buses, taxis and pedal cycles are allowed in bus lanes.  Motorcyles help ease congestion, take up less road space than taxis and, unlike pedal cycles, they do not impede the progress of buses.
